about.title: About Me
about.text-box: I'm Andy Cavedal. I am passionate about programming, music, and science fiction. Don't hesitate to contact me for any collaborative work. I eagerly look forward to forming teams! Below, you'll find some of the projects I have completed so far. However, remember that you can see all the fun I've had on my GitHub.
